protocol_name: Immunoprecipitation using Protein A/G Magnetic Beads
protocol_name_html: Immunoprecipitation using Protein A/G Magnetic Beads
description: This is the protocol for immunoprecipitation using Protein A/G Magnetic Beads.
before_start: Use 25 µl of Protein A/G Magnetic Beads per 200 µl of crude cell lysate containing 200-500 µg of total protein in a standard immunoprecipitation protocol. It is important to increase the volume of beads proportionately for larger cell lysate volumes.
keywords: Protein A magnetic beads, Protein G magnetic beads, immunoprecipitating, non-specific binding to beads, pre-clearing crude cell extract of proteins

components.data: Rinse a 60 mm culture dish of confluent cells with PBS
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Rinse a 60 mm culture dish of confluent cells with PBS

components.data: Lyse the cells with 0.5 ml cold Immunoprecipitation Buffer
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Lyse the cells with 0.5 ml cold Immunoprecipitation Buffer

components.data: Maintain constant agitation for 30 minutes at 4°C
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Maintain constant agitation for 30 minutes at 4°C

components.data: Scrape the cells from the dish
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Scrape the cells from the dish

components.data: Sonicate on ice for 5 seconds; repeat 4 times
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Sonicate on ice for 5 seconds; repeat 4 times

components.data: Assay for total protein then adjust concentration to approximately 1 mg/ml with Immunoprecipitation Buffer
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Assay for total protein then adjust concentration to approximately 1 mg/ml with Immunoprecipitation Buffer

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 7 of Immunoprecipitation using Protein A/G Magnetic Beads
source_data.protocol_name: Immunoprecipitation using Protein A/G Magnetic Beads
source_data.protocol_name_html: Immunoprecipitation using Protein A/G Magnetic Beads
source_data.annotation: The supernatant is the crude cell lysate.
source_data.thread_text: The supernatant is the crude cell lysate.
source_data.body: The supernatant is the crude cell lysate.

components.data: In a 1.5 ml microcentrifuge tube, add 25 μl Protein A/G Magnetic Beads to 200 μl of crude cell extract
components.name: Description

source_data.description: In a 1.5 ml microcentrifuge tube, add 25 μl Protein A/G Magnetic Beads to 200 μl of crude cell extract

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 8 of Immunoprecipitation using Protein A/G Magnetic Beads
source_data.protocol_name: Immunoprecipitation using Protein A/G Magnetic Beads
source_data.protocol_name_html: Immunoprecipitation using Protein A/G Magnetic Beads
source_data.annotation: Steps 8-12 pre-clear crude cell extract of proteins which can bind non-specifically to the beads
source_data.thread_text: Steps 8-12 pre-clear crude cell extract of proteins which can bind non-specifically to the beads
source_data.body: Steps 8-12 pre-clear crude cell extract of proteins which can bind non-specifically to the beads

components.data: Apply magnetic field for 30 seconds to pull beads to the side of the tube
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Apply magnetic field for 30 seconds to pull beads to the side of the tube

components.data: Pipette supernatant to a clean 1.5 ml microcentrifuge tube and discard the beads.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Pipette supernatant to a clean 1.5 ml microcentrifuge tube and discard the beads.

components.data: Add 1-5 μg of antibody to crude cell lysate
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 1-5 μg of antibody to crude cell lysate

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 15 of Immunoprecipitation using Protein A/G Magnetic Beads
source_data.protocol_name: Immunoprecipitation using Protein A/G Magnetic Beads
source_data.protocol_name_html: Immunoprecipitation using Protein A/G Magnetic Beads
source_data.annotation: If monoclonal antibodies are used, add 5 μg rabbit anti-mouse IgG antibody. Vortex and incubate an additional 30 minutes at 4°C. Alternatively, Protein G Magnetic Beads (NEB #S1430S) can be used for immunoprecipitations with monoclonal antibodies.
source_data.thread_text: If monoclonal antibodies are used, add 5 μg rabbit anti-mouse IgG antibody. Vortex and incubate an additional 30 minutes at 4°C. Alternatively, Protein G Magnetic Beads (NEB #S1430S) can be used for immunoprecipitations with monoclonal antibodies.
source_data.body: If monoclonal antibodies are used, add 5 μg rabbit anti-mouse IgG antibody. Vortex and incubate an additional 30 minutes at 4°C. Alternatively, Protein G Magnetic Beads (NEB #S1430S) can be used for immunoprecipitations with monoclonal antibodies.

components.data: Add 25 μl of Protein A/G Magnetic Beads suspension
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 25 μl of Protein A/G Magnetic Beads suspension

components.data: Apply magnetic field to pull beads to the side of the tube
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Apply magnetic field to pull beads to the side of the tube

components.data: (wash #1) Wash with 500 μl of Immunoprecipitation Buffer by gentle vortex
components.name: Description

source_data.description: (wash #1) Wash with 500 μl of Immunoprecipitation Buffer by gentle vortex

components.data: (wash #1) Apply magnetic field then remove supernatant and discard
components.name: Description

source_data.description: (wash #1) Apply magnetic field then remove supernatant and discard

components.data: (wash #2) Wash with 500 μl of Immunoprecipitation Buffer by gentle vortex
components.name: Description

source_data.description: (wash #2) Wash with 500 μl of Immunoprecipitation Buffer by gentle vortex

components.data: (wash #2) Apply magnetic field then remove supernatant and discard
components.name: Description

source_data.description: (wash #2) Apply magnetic field then remove supernatant and discard

components.data: (wash #3) Wash with 500 μl of Immunoprecipitation Buffer by gentle vortex
components.name: Description

source_data.description: (wash #3) Wash with 500 μl of Immunoprecipitation Buffer by gentle vortex

components.data: (wash #3) Apply magnetic field then remove supernatant and discard
components.name: Description

components.data: Resuspend bead pellet in 30 μl of 3X SDS Sample Loading Buffer
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Resuspend bead pellet in 30 μl of 3X SDS Sample Loading Buffer

components.data: Apply magnetic field to sample then load supernatant on SDS-PAGE gel and electrophorese.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Apply magnetic field to sample then load supernatant on SDS-PAGE gel and electrophorese.
